title: Gemini Chatbot
description: An intelligent chatbot capable of context-aware conversations using ML and NLP.

title: Panda - Smart Voice Assistant
description: Voice-activated assistant to interact with users and perform tasks using NLP.

title: Real-Time Hand Gesture & Finger Counter
description: A real-time hand gesture recognition system that uses computer vision to track and count fingers from webcam input, supporting multiple hands and different hand orientations
